sense.def:
Virtue
je pravilno razmišljanje in delovanje ter izogibanje napačnim stvarem.

seg.quote: We accept certain principles of religion and traditional virtue.

sense.def:
A virtue
je dobra lastnost ali ravnanje.

seg.quote: Charity is the greatest of Christian virtues.

sense.def:
A virtue of something
je prednost ali dobra stran nečesa.

seg.quote: There is no virtue in taking this action.
He was an object of interest simply by virtue of being British.
